text: Sherri Shepherd (born April 22, 1967) is an American comedian and actress. She co-hosts The View on ABC Network. On the show Suddenly Susan, she played Miranda Charles and Roni. She also played Angie Jordan on the sitcom 30 Rock. Shepherd was born in Chicago. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American television personalities Category:Comedians from Chicago Category:Actors from Chicago Category:1967 births Category:Living people
title: Sherri Shepherd
